scripts.build: rimraf packages/*/dist && pnpm -r --filter=./packages/* run build && pnpm -r run build-post
scripts.play:mp-weixin: pnpm dev && npm -C playground run dev:mp-weixin
scripts.build:mp-weixin: pnpm build && npm -C playground run build:mp-weixin
scripts.play:h5: pnpm dev && npm -C playground run dev:h5
scripts.build:h5: pnpm build && npm -C playground run build:h5
scripts.play:app: pnpm dev && npm -C playground run dev:app
scripts.build:app: pnpm build && npm -C playground run build:app
